divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my son were walking the dogs this evening, as we were returning,walking through a feild behind our house, I noticed a very large array of lights, I asked my son "what the heck is that" the lights were to the West, and looked like a giant ring with about 5 diamonds on it, and then poof it was lights out. When the lights went out on this object you could still see an outline of the large stationary vehical? about 5 seconds later another smaller light appeared above the object, and disappeared.The night was very clear, as I noticed alot of air traffic above the seen object (maybe 4-5 planes). I waited and watched another 5 min with no more lights. My first thought was it was some Military exercise, but I have seen flares before , and this was not flares.
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There was one other sighting in Kokomo on or around July 24th 2008
